title: StudySync
description: A web app to boost productivity by helping students securely manage study notes and tasks with user authentication, subject-wise organization, and a built-in planner to schedule and log activities .

title: AptiTrack
description: A dynamic and responsive website to practice aptitude questions topic-wise, along with final score, time taken, and explanation for each question to aid self-improvement.

title: Calculator
description: A simple calculator offering basic arithmetic operations with a clean and responsive design.

title: Portfolio
description: A portfolio website showcasing my skills,projects and competitive programming ratings.
